mapper.select: select user_id userId,user_name userName, user_photo userPhoto, user_sex userSex,user_fans userFans,user_fans_f userFansf, guest guest, user_state userState,DATE_FORMAT(first_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') firstTime,DATE_FORMAT(update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime from fly_user where user_id = (select max(user_id) from fly_user)
mapper.insert: insert into fly_user (user_uuid userUuid,user_name, user_photo, user_sex, user_fans, user_fans_f, guest, user_state) values (#{userUuid},#{userName},#{userPhoto},#{userSex},0,0,0,0);
insert into fly_user (user_uuid userUuid,user_name, user_photo, user_sex, user_fans, user_fans_f, guest, user_state) values (#{userUuid},#{userName},#{userPhoto},#{userSex},0,0,1,0);
mapper.update: update fly_user set user_fans_f = #{userFansf},user_state =#{userState} where user_id = #{userId};
update fly_user set user_state =#{userState} where user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select sum(user_fans+user_fans_f) from fly_user where user_id =#{userId};

select t1.user_id userId,t1.user_uuid userUuid,t1.user_name userName,t1.user_photo userPhoto, t1.user_sex userSex,t1.user_fans userFans,t1.user_fans_f userFansf, t1.guest guest, t2.close_name userState,DATE_FORMAT(first_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') firstTime,DATE_FORMAT(update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime from fly_user t1,fly_userstate t2
t1.user_state =t2.close_id
and user_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName}),'%')
and t1.user_id > 1
LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow};
select id Id,close_id closeId, close_name closeName from fly_userstate;
